summary: Adds a powerful, yet balanced, and lore-friendly artifact of Molag Bal. The Coldharbour Greatsword is a deadly two-handed sword which absorbs magicka, deals frost damage, and steals the souls of its victims.
descriptionHtml:
This is an old, creation kit release era mod that has been on the Steam Workshop for a long time. I only uploaded it here because it was requested.

Adds a powerful, yet balanced, and lore-friendly artifact of Molag Bal. The Coldharbour Greatsword is a deadly two-handed sword which absorbs magicka, deals frost damage, and steals the souls of its victims.

----------

Intended to be used by Shadowknight type-builds, the sword is statistically similar to a Daedric Greatsword but slightly more powerful (25 base damage instead of 24). 

It is custom enchanted with 25 points of Magicka Absorb, 25 points of Frost/Stamina damage, and 3 seconds of Soul Trap with a reasonable amount of charges. 

It can be tempered with an ebony ingot and is affected by Daedric Smithing. 

Visually, it is a reskinned Dwarven Greatsword with a particle effect. 

-------------------- 
| How to Obtain | 
-------------------- 

With Daedric Smithing, the sword can be crafted by combining a Daedra Heart and the Mace of Molag Bal at a forge. 

You may also convert the Coldharbour Greatsword back into the Mace of Molag Bal by combining it with a Daedra Heart at a forge (under Misc). 

--------------- 
| Other Info | 
--------------- 

Dawnguard is not required. 

This was my first attempt at creating a visually customized item and it\'s not perfect, but it turned out fairly well. There\'s a minor issue with a texture seam I wasn\'t able to fix, but it is not too noticable. 

----------------------------------- 
| Check out my other mods | 
-----------------------------------

author: Unburied
